author: Dianne M
title: Lovely boutique hotel in theatre district
text:
My partner and I stayed at The Piccadilly Hotel on Shaftesbury Avenue..we were going to a show and celebrating his birthday. The hotel is in a great location, right in theatre land and close to other attractions....a short walk to Covent Garden...
We were asked, when checking in, if there was a special occasion and I said it was my partners birthday...we had our room upgraded to a four poster room....we were given a glass of Prosecco (very niIce touch)...the staff were very helpful and friendly...
Our room was lovely....very clean...the bed was fab and very comfortable...there were flowers, fruit and water....also a mini bar (had to pay for that)...the bathroom was fitted out to a very high standard....a fabulous bath....Elemis products....robes and slippers ...hair dryer...a turn down service... all in all it made for a romantic evening and didn't have to check out until 12 noon the next day...
Thank you for helping to make our weekend extra special...would definitely recommend and return to this fab hotel...
